segments.text: I feel a bit down seeing this kitchen on the verge of ruin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so intent on her task, unaware of the trouble brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflowing from the sink, pooling sadly on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron might get ruined in that mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy reaching for cookies, but the stool wobbles so precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and hurt himself, breaking the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits patiently, her little hand up, full of hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But this sneaky cookie grab feels like it could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a beautiful garden, so serene compared to here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how the water damages the pretty cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes waiting to be washed, now threatened by the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn around and save the day.
segments.speaker: PAR
